basics.label: PhD Student in Electrical and Computer Engineering
basics.summary: PhD student at Rutgers University working on physical-layer security, covert wireless communication, and distributed computing. Research interests include detection and estimation in wireless networks, coded computing, and secure communication systems.

work.summary: Conducting research on covert and secure wireless communication, detection theory, and distributed signal processing under adversarial models.
